House, many signs point to him running for Indiana governor in 2012 instead. No one else mulling a presidential run faces a similar quandary. Mr. Bauer Mike Pence says he plans to announce his decision early next year. I'd put money on him running for governor over president, because the field is a lot smaller and he wouldn't be running against an incumbent, says Indiana's recently retired GOP chairman, Murray Clark . We have been late at adding social capabilities to our core products " Eric Schmidt Google executive chairman The firm offered German homeowners the right to opt out before the pictures were even taken, and nearly 3% duly did that. running as a Democrat effectively allows him to cut out the middle man when it comes to casting votes against Barack Obama . "I don't want to quarrel with Sarah Palin and Mike Huckabee ," Randall Terry said. I want to focus on the madman, Barack Obama . Barack Obama is the central figure of voter rage. There are people, myself included, who loathe this presidency. By going against him in a Democratic primary, I can focus on him like a laser beam and I will. support behind Dick Armey Mike Pence ( R-IN), who many social conservatives view as their 2012 choice. Klaus Schwab said he doesn't think it will. "I'm absolutely sure that the euro will not collapse because I think there is still a strong European solidarity in place," he told AP. Europe, in this new world that is coming up, if it wants to become a key actor and stay a key actor it has to express itself in terms of its unity and it has to make sure that euro is also secured by a much greater common effort, working together in fiscal monetary and general economic policies.
